name: Redirect Pain
tooltip: Focus your will ignoring pain and reflecting incoming damage back to your attackers. Effects scale with Pips spent. 1 Pip: Gain 2250 Barrier and 7% Retribution for 6 seconds. 2 Pips: Gain 3000 Barrier and 9% Retribution for 9 seconds. 3 Pips: Gain 3750 Barrier and 11% Retribution for 12 seconds. 4 Pips: Gain 4500 Barrier and 13% Retribution for 15 seconds. 5 Pips: Gain 5230 Barrier and 15% Retribution for 18 seconds.
